get.description: Retrieve user timelogs for a specified period.

schema.description: The username of the user to retrieve timelogs for.
schema.title: Username

parameters.name: start_time

schema.description: The start date for the timelog period.
schema.title: Start Time

parameters.description: The start date for the timelog period.

parameters.name: end_time

schema.description: The end date for the timelog period.
schema.title: End Time

parameters.description: The end date for the timelog period.

parameters.name: first

schema.description: Number of timelogs to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: after

schema.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of timelogs.
